name: CUSTOM Bundle builder #3

products.label: Products
products.description: Leave the collection empty to select other products.

bundle_product.label: Bundle product
bundle_product.description: To set up a Bundle box in your Shopify backend, create a new product and add variants for each bundle option you wish to offer.

limits.label: Limits products for variants
limits.description: Enter the required product quantities to fulfill each bundle, separated by commas.

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load images for speed optimisation
